data.title: Advertising on NBC Syndicated Networks
data.meta_description: As a TV brand that appreciates and embraces the emotional journey that makes crime addictive, we are excited for the new content that creates an environment to build valuable connections with an engaged consumer. Oxygen will stay true to its core female viewers and continue to ramp up its programming efforts with a consistent, yet unique […]
data.text:
Source:

42 Million P2+ Linear Viewers Monthly: Nielsen NPower. Includes Access Hollywood, Access Daily/Wknd, Chicago Fire – Wkly, Chicago P.D. – Wkly, Dateline M-F, Dateline Strip, Jerry Springer, Karamo, Kelly Clarkson, L&O: SVU M-F, L&O:SVU Wkly, Maury, Steve Wilkos. Sep’23 / Oct’23 / Nov’23 Average. Live+7 6-min qualifier. Based on Per2+ Impressions).

The Kelly Clarkson Show: Nielsen NNTV. NSS PTD 2023-24 (thru 12/3/2023). Kelly Clarkson Show Rank vs. All CC Type Codes. Live+SD US AA%.

TKCS #1 Afternoon Syndicated Talk Show: Nielsen NNTV. NSS PTD 2023-24 (thru 12/3/2023). Kelly Clarkson Show Rank vs. All CC Type Codes. Live+SD US AA%. Afternoon talk shows refer to programs that air primarily during that time period.

Access Hollywood: Distributed Partner API’s, Data pulled in January 2024 (all bullets except #1 ranking claim). #1 claim – Talkwalker Social Content Ratings, Ranked by interactions. 1/1/2023-1/31/2023 vs. prior calendar year.
